opt_desc.message:
A mini tool to use Twitter comfortably.
Hide 'ForYou/Trending or etc' entries.
Add image fold buttons.
 (need to reload)

opt_purge_trends.message: Search strings to be Hidden in trends/etc.

opt_purge_desc.message:
Starting with ? means reg-ex.
Starting with ?? affects name and body.
(Top of ?/?? is not evaluated as reg-ex)

opt_shortcut.message: To diasble twitter shortcuts. ('F' key means to add 'FAV' or etc)

opt_explore_verify.message: Hide verified user of # tabs (Hide promoted entry)

opt_fold.message: Using fold button in a tweet with image.

opt_direct_pass.message: Prevent to hide the tweet that is opened directly.

opt_explore_rev.message: Fold the top image of # tabs as default.(requires to check the Using fold button)

opt_uidesc_contents.message:
1. A tweet with image will has 'O' button at right/buttom position for folding.

2. If Twitter Stress Reduction Icon is clicked, its all funcions will be stopped.

3. To confirm hide string in DevTools that is shown with Ctrl + Shift + i on twitter screen.

opt_history.message:
v2.9.0: Refine
v2.8.2: Bugfix
v2.8.1: For Firefox Nightly(Android)
v2.7.2: Add Sync Search String To Hide
Add v2.6.0: Add Fold button On/Off
v2.5.0: Add regex check button
v2.4.5-v2.4.13: misc
v2.4.4: Change format spec

opt_synchelp.message:
Sync the 'Search strings to be Hidden' via api.shirouzu.jp, if the machines that are set with the same SharedKey.
(The strings will be AES encrypted before upload)

opt_syncdesc.message: Sync the 'Search strings to be Hidden'

opt_ex1_title.message: To hide a tweet with specified user account.

opt_ex1_suppl.message: (Hide the user's message and reply messages that contains @user)

opt_ex2_title.message: To hide user that name has specified icon.

opt_ex3_title.message: To hide a tweet that contains specified charset.

opt_ex3_suppl.message: (specify first and last character of the unicode block)

opt_ex3_desc.message:
??.*[Í∞Ä-Ìû£].* ... Hide a tweet that contains Hankul
??.*[–Ä-Íöö].* ... Hide a tweet that contains Kyrill
??.*[ìÄÄ-ìêÆ].* ... Hide a tweet that contains Hieroglyph
